text: @AndyOstroy THE COVIDIOTS — they are the exact opposite of The Beatles: horrible music, replace love with hate “all you need is hate, bum ba da da dum..” 🎶 and while they sing they shed the novel coronavirus all over the Tulsa rally. They won’t wear masks so they can “own the libs.” Merica! https://t.co/iFKZo0U21D
